
```{r, results="asis"}

load('C:/Users/Chantel.Wetzel/Documents/GitHub/data_summary/data/summarized_all_data.rdat')
data <- all_data

# Add data to use to the data matrix
data$use_data <- NA
species_data <- get_species_data()
for (a in 1:nrow(species_data)){
	key <- grep(species_data[a, "species_name"], data$common_name, ignore.case = TRUE)
	data[key, "use_data"] <- species_data[a, "data"]
}

# Filter down for only the species we are examining
find = NULL
for (a in 1:nrow(species_data)){
	find <- c(find, grep(species_data[a, "species_name"], data$common_name, ignore.case = TRUE))
}
data <- data[find, ]
data$name = firstup(data$common_name)
```

```{r loop-output, results="asis"}

data %>%
	group_by(name) %>%
	distinct(name) %>%
	pull(name) %>%
	as.character() %>%
	walk(multiplot)
 
```
